title: Drawing, "Sketches from Jamaica, West Indies", August 1865
inscribed: Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at bottom left:  Jamaica / Farm Galleway Hill / Aug / 65
description:
Recto:  Horizontal bird's eye view over hills and mountain ridges of ascending toward the right.

Verso:  Horizontal view containing at right a vertical row of three designs, probably referring to wood carvings:  a corner of a panel; a trefoil inscribed into an oblong; and oblong pane with a lozenge coffer.  In opposite direction calculations referring to days in August beginning:   "31";  monograms CF and FI; calendar for August.  Vertically two columns of:  "Mon Aug 7
                                               Got 24", etc.
and not;  the sum totals are 51 and 60, respectively.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from Jamaica, West Indies", August 1865.
August 1865. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-208.
